text:
Hello everyone.
Im new to HubSpot but I have built an private app with a button that opens up a modal, but I can not figure out how can I set the modal to be 75% width instead of width="lg" I have tryed with "style" and .css overrides but doesnt seem that it is taking any of those values, can anyone help to guide me please?
`<Button`
          `_overlay_={`
            <Modal
              `_className_="custom-modal"` 
              `_id_="default-modal"` 
              `_title_="Enrich Company Data"`
              `_width_="lg"`
            >
              <ModalBody>
              </ModalBody>
            </Modal>
          }
        >
        Enrich Company
</Button>
